price: Na hapana mmoja ila wote watakusanywa waletwe mbele yetu.
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: Hapana katika mataifa yaliyo tangulia na yajayo ila wote watakusanywa mbele yetu, nao wamelazimishwa kuhudhuria mbele yetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
